description:
You will learn how to make a blog from nothing. Using CSSwe will design our blog and with PHP and MySQL we will make (programm) our blog. You need to know basics of HTML and what is a programming language. To take part you need to download and install Notepad++and to download, JUST download, XAMPP. The course is structured as it follows:Introduction, Design, Programming.

In first chapter you will learn the basics of PHP, MySQL and CSS and the following chapters we will program our blog. In the second section we will design our blog, with other words, we will make the template for our blog. And in the third chapter we will program our blog. After you finish this course, you will be able to make a blog from zero!
title: Learn how to build a blog
